PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_TPLCODE:
layoutsize="${layoutsize}" <#if CONTROL_ID??&&CONTROL_ID!="" >id="${CONTROL_ID}" > <#list layoutlist as layout>
id="${layout.LAYOUT_ID}" <#if layout.SUPPORT_YSCROLL=="1" >style="overflow-y:auto;" >

<form method="post" class="form-horizontal platdesigncomp" platcompname="表单容器" compcode="${FORMCONTROL_COMPCODE}"
compcontrolid="${FORMCONTROL_ID}" platcomid="${FORMCONTROL_ID}" uibtnsrights="add,edit,del"
action="${FORM_ACTION!''}" id="${CONTROL_ID}" style="${FORM_STYLE!''}">

</form>
PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_DESIGNCODE:
<form method="post" class="form-horizontal platdesigncomp" platcompname="表单容器" compcode="formcontainer"
compcontrolid="402881e65b62338e015b62637b350047" platcomid="402881e65b62338e015b62637b350047" uibtnsrights="add,edit,del"
action="system/SysUserController.do?saveOrUpdate" id="SysUserForm" style="">

</form>
PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_FINCODE:
<form method="post" class="form-horizontal platdesigncomp" platcompname="表单容器" compcode="formcontainer"
compcontrolid="402881e65b62338e015b62637b350047" platcomid="402881e65b62338e015b62637b350047" uibtnsrights="add,edit,del"
action="system/SysUserController.do?saveOrUpdate" id="SysUserForm" style="">

</form>

PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_TPLCODE:
<#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
<#if !PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? > id="${CONTROL_ID}" >
PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_FINCODE:
<input type="hidden"  name="SYSUSER_ID" value="${sysUser.SYSUSER_ID}"
       
  >

PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_TPLCODE: id="${CONTROL_ID}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" >
id="${CONTROL_ID}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" >

<#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
multiple="multiple" <#if MAX_SELECT_NUM?? >max_select_num="${MAX_SELECT_NUM}" <#if CONTROL_LABEL?? >label_value="${CONTROL_LABEL}" <#if COMP_PLACEHOLDER?? >placeholder="${COMP_PLACEHOLDER}" <#if COMP_COL_NUM?? >comp_col_num="${COMP_COL_NUM}" <#if LABEL_COL_NUM?? >label_col_num="${LABEL_COL_NUM}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" <#if CONTROL_ATTACH?? >attach_props="${CONTROL_ATTACH}" <#if DATA_TYPE=='1' >static_values="${STATICVALUES}" <#if DATA_TYPE=='2' >dyna_interface="${DYNAINTERFACE}" dyna_param="${DYNAPARAM}" > <#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_FINCODE:
<plattag:select name="SYSUSER_COMPANYID" allowblank="false" auth_type="write" 
      value="${sysUser.SYSUSER_COMPANYID}" istree="true" onlyselectleaf="false" 
            label_value="所在单位"
      placeholder="请选择用户所在单位"
      comp_col_num="4"
      label_col_num="2"
      
      
      
      dyna_interface="commonUIService.findGenTreeSelectorDatas" dyna_param="[TABLE_NAME:PLAT_SYSTEM_COMPANY],[TREE_IDANDNAMECOL:COMPANY_ID,COMPANY_NAME],[TREE_QUERYFIELDS:COMPANY_PARENTID,COMPANY_PATH],[FILTERS:COMPANY_PARENTID_EQ|0]
" 
   >
   </plattag:select>

PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_TPLCODE:
<#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
multiple="multiple" <#if MAX_SELECT_NUM?? >max_select_num="${MAX_SELECT_NUM}" <#if CONTROL_LABEL?? >label_value="${CONTROL_LABEL}" <#if COMP_PLACEHOLDER?? >placeholder="${COMP_PLACEHOLDER}" <#if COMP_COL_NUM?? >comp_col_num="${COMP_COL_NUM}" <#if LABEL_COL_NUM?? >label_col_num="${LABEL_COL_NUM}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" <#if CONTROL_ATTACH?? >attach_props="${CONTROL_ATTACH}" <#if DATA_TYPE=='1' >static_values="${STATICVALUES}" <#if DATA_TYPE=='2' >dyna_interface="${DYNAINTERFACE}" dyna_param="${DYNAPARAM}" > <#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_FINCODE:
<plattag:select name="SYSUSER_DEPARTID" allowblank="true" auth_type="write" 
      value="${sysUser.SYSUSER_DEPARTID}" istree="true" onlyselectleaf="false" 
            label_value="所在部门"
      placeholder="请选择用户所在部门"
      comp_col_num="4"
      label_col_num="2"
      
      
      
      dyna_interface="departService.findSelectTree" dyna_param="${sysUser.SYSUSER_COMPANYID}" 
   >
   </plattag:select>

PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_TPLCODE: id="${CONTROL_ID}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" >

<#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
datarule="${DATA_RULE}" <#if MAX_LENGTH?? >maxlength="${MAX_LENGTH}" <#if CONTROL_LABEL?? >label_value="${CONTROL_LABEL}" <#if COMP_PLACEHOLDER?? >placeholder="${COMP_PLACEHOLDER}" <#if COMP_COL_NUM?? >comp_col_num="${COMP_COL_NUM}" <#if LABEL_COL_NUM?? >label_col_num="${LABEL_COL_NUM}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" <#if CONTROL_ATTACH?? >attach_props="${CONTROL_ATTACH}" <#if COMP_MAX_VALUE?? >max="${COMP_MAX_VALUE}" <#if COMP_MIN_VALUE?? >min="${COMP_MIN_VALUE}" > <#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_FINCODE:
<plattag:input name="SYSUSER_ACCOUNT" allowblank="false" auth_type="write" 
      value="${sysUser.SYSUSER_ACCOUNT}" 
      datarule="required;onlyLetterNumberUnderLine;remote[common/baseController.do?checkUnique&VALID_TABLENAME=PLAT_SYSTEM_SYSUSER&VALID_FIELDLABLE=用户账号&VALID_FIELDNAME=SYSUSER_ACCOUNT]"  
      maxlength="30"
      label_value="用户账号"
      placeholder="请输入用户账号"
      comp_col_num="4"
      label_col_num="2"
      
      
      
      
   >
   </plattag:input>

PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_TPLCODE:
<#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
datarule="${DATA_RULE}" <#if MAX_LENGTH?? >maxlength="${MAX_LENGTH}" <#if CONTROL_LABEL?? >label_value="${CONTROL_LABEL}" <#if COMP_PLACEHOLDER?? >placeholder="${COMP_PLACEHOLDER}" <#if COMP_COL_NUM?? >comp_col_num="${COMP_COL_NUM}" <#if LABEL_COL_NUM?? >label_col_num="${LABEL_COL_NUM}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" <#if CONTROL_ATTACH?? >attach_props="${CONTROL_ATTACH}" <#if COMP_MAX_VALUE?? >max="${COMP_MAX_VALUE}" <#if COMP_MIN_VALUE?? >min="${COMP_MIN_VALUE}" > <#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_FINCODE:
<plattag:input name="SYSUSER_NAME" allowblank="false" auth_type="write" 
      value="${sysUser.SYSUSER_NAME}" 
      datarule="required;"  
      maxlength="30"
      label_value="用户姓名"
      placeholder="请输入用户姓名"
      comp_col_num="4"
      label_col_num="2"
      
      
      
      
   >
   </plattag:input>

PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_TPLCODE: id="${CONTROL_ID}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" >

<#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
datarule="${DATA_RULE}" <#if MAX_LENGTH?? >maxlength="${MAX_LENGTH}" <#if CONTROL_LABEL?? >label_value="${CONTROL_LABEL}" <#if COMP_PLACEHOLDER?? >placeholder="${COMP_PLACEHOLDER}" <#if COMP_COL_NUM?? >comp_col_num="${COMP_COL_NUM}" <#if LABEL_COL_NUM?? >label_col_num="${LABEL_COL_NUM}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" <#if CONTROL_ATTACH?? >attach_props="${CONTROL_ATTACH}" <#if COMP_MAX_VALUE?? >max="${COMP_MAX_VALUE}" <#if COMP_MIN_VALUE?? >min="${COMP_MIN_VALUE}" > <#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_FINCODE:
<plattag:input name="SYSUSER_MOBILE" allowblank="true" auth_type="write" 
      value="${sysUser.SYSUSER_MOBILE}" 
      datarule="mobile;"  
      maxlength="14"
      label_value="手机号"
      placeholder="请输入手机号"
      comp_col_num="4"
      label_col_num="2"
      
      
      
      
   >
   </plattag:input>

PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_TPLCODE:
<#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
label_value="${CONTROL_LABEL}" <#if COMP_COL_NUM?? >comp_col_num="${COMP_COL_NUM}" <#if LABEL_COL_NUM?? >label_col_num="${LABEL_COL_NUM}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" <#if CONTROL_ATTACH?? >attach_props="${CONTROL_ATTACH}" <#if DATA_TYPE=='1' >static_values="${STATICVALUES}" <#if DATA_TYPE=='2' >dyna_interface="${DYNAINTERFACE}" dyna_param="${DYNAPARAM}" > <#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_FINCODE:
<plattag:radio name="SYSUSER_SEX" allowblank="true" auth_type="write" 
      value="${sysUser.SYSUSER_SEX}" select_first="true" is_horizontal="true"
      label_value="性别"
      comp_col_num="4"
      label_col_num="2"
      
      
      static_values="男:1,女:-1"
      
   >
   </plattag:radio>

PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_TPLCODE: <#list operbtns as btn>

<#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
<#if CHECKCASCADEN?? >checkcascaden="${CHECKCASCADEN?replace(',','')}" <#if CHECKCASCADEY?? >checkcascadey="${CHECKCASCADEY?replace(',','')}" checktype="${CHECKTYPE}" <#if ALLOW_BLANK=='false' >datarule="required;" <#if MAXSELECT?? >maxselect="${MAXSELECT}" <#if MINSELECT?? >minselect="${MINSELECT}" <#if CONTROL_LABEL?? >label_value="${CONTROL_LABEL}" <#if COMP_PLACEHOLDER?? >placeholder="${COMP_PLACEHOLDER}" <#if COMP_COL_NUM?? >comp_col_num="${COMP_COL_NUM}" <#if LABEL_COL_NUM?? >label_col_num="${LABEL_COL_NUM}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" <#if CONTROL_ATTACH?? >attach_props="${CONTROL_ATTACH}" > <#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_FINCODE:
<plattag:winselector name="SYSUSER_ROLEIDS" allowblank="false" auth_type="write" 
      value="${sysUser.SYSUSER_ROLEIDS}" selectorurl="system/SysUserController.do?goRoleGrant&USER_ID=${sysUser.SYSUSER_ID}" title="角色选择器" 
      width="80%" height="70%" selectedlabels="${sysUser.SYSUSER_ROLENAMES}"
      datarule="required;" 
      maxselect="100"
      minselect="1"
      label_value="选择角色"
      placeholder="请选择角色"
      comp_col_num="10"
      label_col_num="2"
      
      
   >
   </plattag:winselector>

PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_TPLCODE: id="${CONTROL_ID}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" >

<#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
multiple="multiple" <#if MAX_SELECT_NUM?? >max_select_num="${MAX_SELECT_NUM}" <#if CONTROL_LABEL?? >label_value="${CONTROL_LABEL}" <#if COMP_PLACEHOLDER?? >placeholder="${COMP_PLACEHOLDER}" <#if COMP_COL_NUM?? >comp_col_num="${COMP_COL_NUM}" <#if LABEL_COL_NUM?? >label_col_num="${LABEL_COL_NUM}" <#if CONTROL_STYLE?? >style="${CONTROL_STYLE}" <#if CONTROL_ATTACH?? >attach_props="${CONTROL_ATTACH}" <#if DATA_TYPE=='1' >static_values="${STATICVALUES}" <#if DATA_TYPE=='2' >dyna_interface="${DYNAINTERFACE}" dyna_param="${DYNAPARAM}" > <#if PLAT_DESIGNMODE?? >
PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_FINCODE:
<plattag:select name="SYSUSER_GROUPID" allowblank="true" auth_type="write" 
      value="${sysUser.SYSUSER_GROUPID}" istree="false" onlyselectleaf="false" 
            label_value="用户组"
      placeholder="请选择所在用户组"
      comp_col_num="4"
      label_col_num="2"
      
      
      
      dyna_interface="sysUserGroupService.findSelectList" dyna_param="${sysUser.SYSUSER_COMPANYID}" 
   >
   </plattag:select>
